dmca.title: Google DMCA Complaint Phillips4Williams
dmca.body:
RICHARD E. PHILLIPS, P.C.
ATTORNEY AT LAW
555 E. MAIN STREET, SUITE 1410
NORFOLK, VIRGINIA 23510

PHONE: (757) 416-5701
FAX: (757) 623-0759

Google, Inc.
ATTN: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

November 30, 2006

Re: DMCA Notice

To Whom It May Concern:

I am the attorney representing Allison Williams. It has come to our attention that websites are advertising, or advertising links to, a sex video in which my client was a participant.

This tape is of a performance by my client and is being distributed on the internet and through other media without my client's authorization. The websites promoting this tape are engaging in copyright infringement.

Pursuant to Sections 512 (c) (3) and 512 (d) (3) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (17 USC sections 512 (c) (3) and 512 (d) (3)), I place you on notice of the copyright infringement and ask that you remove the infringing websites from your search engine immediately.

The following Google web searches link to the offending websites:
Allison Williams
Alison Williams
Allison Williams sex tape
Alison Williams sex tape
Allison Williams sex video
Alison Williams sex video
Allison Williams tv reporter
Alison Williams tv reporter

The following websites are known to be engaging in copyright infringement against my client:
http://www.phun.org/phun/pics/allison_williams/allison-williams-sex-video-alison
